body:
Admiration is the daughter of ignorance.

No battle is worth fighting except the last one.
The sounder your argument, the more satisfaction you get out of it.
You're only young once, but you can be immature forever.
We're going to see a lot more young people entering entrepreneurial ventures.
When your work speaks for itself, get out of the way.
Well, if I called the wrong number, why did you answer the phone?
The stars are constantly shining, but often we do not see them until the dark hours.
We all need each other.
If you're too busy to help those around you succeed, you're too busy.
A pint of example is worth a gallon of advice
Trust not to much to appearances.
One murder makes a villain, millions often a hero.
A clever, imagination, humorous request can open closed doors and closed minds.
When I see a bird that walks like a duck and swims like a duck and quacks like a duck, I call that bird a duck.
In youth we run into difficulties. In old age difficulties run into us.
